configuration:
dfs.namenode.name.dir file:///hadoop/hdfs/name
dfs.datanode.data.dir file:///hadoop/hdfs/data
dfs.namenode.acls.enabled true
fs.permissions.umask-mode 002
# dfs.journalnode.edits.dir - the path where the JournalNode daemon will store its local state
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir /hadoop/hdfs/journal
# dfs.nameservices - the logical name for this new nameservice
dfs.nameservices bigdatacluster
# dfs.ha.namenodes.[nameservice ID] - unique identifiers for each
dfs.ha.namenodes.bigdatacluster namenode1,namenode2
# dfs.namenode.rpc-address.[nameservice ID].[name node ID] - the fully-qualified rpc address for each NameNode to listen on
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.bigdatacluster.namenode1 ecsd00300a03.epam.com:8020
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.bigdatacluster.namenode2 ecsd00300a04.epam.com:8020
# dfs.namenode.http-address.[nameservice ID].[name node ID] - the fully-qualified HTTP address for each NameNode to listen on
dfs.namenode.http-address.bigdatacluster.namenode1 ecsd00300a03.epam.com:50070
dfs.namenode.http-address.bigdatacluster.namenode2 ecsd00300a04.epam.com:50070
# dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir - the URI which identifies the group of JNs where the NameNodes will write/read edits
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://ecsd00300a03.epam.com:8485;ecsd00300a04.epam.com:8485;ecsd00300a05.epam.com:8485/bigdatacluster
# dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.[nameservice ID] - the Java class that HDFS clients use to contact the Active NameNode
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.bigdatacluster org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
# dfs.ha.fencing.methods - a list of scripts or Java classes which will be used to fence the Active NameNode during a failover
dfs.ha.fencing.methods sshfence
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.private-key-files /home/hdfs/.ssh/id_rsa
# Zookeeper automatic-failover
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
ha.zookeeper.quorum ecsd00300a03.epam.com:2181,ecsd00300a04.epam.com:2181,ecsd00300a05.epam.com:2181
